rooms.name: Entrance Hallway and Living Room
rooms.description: Mediterranean style living room with ambient lighting, a central coffee table, and decorative mosaic tiles in warm earth tones. The area leads to the staircase for upper levels.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, this dining area features an open-plan design with a long dining table and chairs that reflect Mediterranean aesthetics.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open kitchen designed in Mediterranean style with stone countertops, wooden accents, and ample storage. The kitchen opens into the dining area for seamless flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact yet functional bathroom equipped with essential fixtures; maintains Mediterranean design elements like terracotta tiles and subtle color accents.

rooms.name: Utility/Service Area
rooms.description: Essential space for storage, laundry, and other utilities, designed to be discreet yet accessible from the kitchen area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom with Balcony
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed in Mediterranean style, featuring a private balcony overlooking the skyline. Vastu-aligned orientation for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom with Balcony
rooms.description: Well-appointed bedroom with Mediterranean decor and a private balcony. Carefully positioned to ensure privacy and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom with Balcony
rooms.description: Functional bedroom with ample natural light, decorated in warm hues typical of Mediterranean aesthetics, complete with a balcony for ventilation.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Open-air terrace designed as a communal relaxation space. Incorporates Mediterranean design with stone pathways, seating areas, and ambient lighting.
